title: Welcome to RhythmiRust Wiki
subheading: Welcome to RhythmiRust! This wiki will help you learn how to use the programme effectively.

contents.Text: •[[[button:Wiki Navigation][Wiki Navigation]]]- Click here to understand the wiki layout
Everything about RhythmiRust's interface:
•[[[button:Main Window][Main Window]]]- The heart of RhythmiRust's UI
•[[[button:Search][Main Window/Search]]]- Where you can enter queries and view search results for your music
•[[[button:Favourites][Main Window/Favourites]]]- Save and organise your frequently played tracks for quick access
•[[[button:History][Main Window/History]]]- View your recently played tracks and previous sessions
•[[[button:Music Player][Main Window/Music Player]]]- Control playback, view currently playing track, and manage your song queue
•[[[button:Downloader][Main Window/Downloader]]]- Download music directly from supported websites
•[[[button:Metadata Editor][Main Window/Metadata Editor]]]- Edit metadata for songs found by the searcher
•[[[button:Settings][Main Window/Settings]]]- Configure app preferences and customize your experience
Learn how to make the most of RhythmiRust:
•[[[button:Optimise Performance][_Guides/Optimise Performance]]]- Optimise for low-end hardware
•[[[button:Search While Indexing][_Guides/Search While Indexing]]]- Search all files while the indexer is running
•[[[button:Newb Download Guide][_Guides/Newb Download Guide]]]- Beginner friendly download guide
Need help?
•[[[button:Troubleshooting][/Help/Troubleshooting]]] - [[[strikethrough:Solve common issues]]]
•[[[button:FAQ][_Help/FAQ]]]- Frequently asked questions
RhythmiRust - Your Music, Your Way
A feature-rich music player with an efficient, distraction-free interface.
Powerful functionality meets minimalist design - search, download, and manage your music without the bloat.
•[[[button:Developer/About][About]]]
If you are interested in helping develop the wiki, please visit the [[[hyperlink:Contribution Guide][https://github.com/UnknownSuperficialNight/RhythmiRust-Wiki]]]on GitHub for more details.
